title: Is it a good idea to have a tattoo?
description: Are you prepared to be the canvas for a painting that might last forever?

vocabItems.definition: name for a shop or room where certain businesses carry out their trade – such as a tattoo parlour, a massage parlour or an ice cream parlour
someone who uses imagination and experiments with new ideas
show outwardly how you feel and what you’re thinking
activity that is currently popular and making lots of money
make something less strong or less valuable
